item.title: Binary Search Trees
item.description: Libraries Excellent third-party modules: bintrees,1 sortedcontainers.2 Test if a binary tree is a BST One approach is to check constrains on the values for each subtree. The basic idea generalises: if all nodes in a tree must have keys in the range [l, u], and the key at root is w (which is must be between [l, u], otherwise the requirement is violated at the root itself), then all nodes in the left subtree must be between [l, w], and all nodes in right subtree between [w, u].
